headline: Tracking Chase Coleman's Tiger Global Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: Tiger Global's 13F portfolio surged to $34.08B, driven by concentrated bets in tech giants like Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, Alphabet, and Nvidia. Read the full analysis now.

headline: Oppenheimer Maintains Outperform on Workday (WDAY), Trims Target Amid Guidance
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the best tech stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On August 22, Oppenheimer analyst Brian Schwartz maintained an Outperform rating on human capital-related Cloud provider Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY), while trimming its price target from $300 to $270. The updated price target came one day after the company reported its […]

headline: Chime Financial (CHYM) Announces its Partnership with Workday
summary: Chime Financial, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHYM) is one of the Tech Stocks to Buy with the Highest Upside Potential. On August 22, Chime Financial, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHYM) announced its strategic partnership with Workday, a major HR and financial management platform, to integrate Chime Workplace into Workday Wellness. headline: Achievers Launches Learn & Recognize Built on Workday App
summary: TORONTO, September 04, 2025--Achievers, one of the most utilized recognition and reward software, today announced that it has forged tighter integrations with Workday through the Built on Workday program. As part of this initiative, Achievers has developed the "Learn & Recognize" app, which identifies skills deficiencies and incentivizes employees with points and achievements for acquiring skills. headline: High Growth Tech Stocks in the US for September 2025
summary: As of September 2025, the U.S. stock market has seen a boost from major tech stocks, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq climbing higher despite uncertainties surrounding trade policies and potential Federal Reserve rate cuts. In this environment, identifying high growth tech stocks involves looking at companies that not only capitalize on technological advancements but also demonstrate resilience amid fluctuating economic indicators and regulatory shifts.
